content: 1 a bat in need of a hat crochet pattern by belle essie crochet instagram belle essiecrochet in this pattern i used a size 3 5mm hook with 8ply yarn 4 seasons marvel yarn from spotlight for the bat i used size 7 5mm black safety eyes i have made this pattern as simple and as quick to make as possible it should take approximately one hour to complete this is a free pattern however i will be regularly releasing different bat hats pattern packs which will include different hats for the bat to wear these pattern packs will help to transform this bat into a blind box item think smiskis or sonny angels which will be perfect for selling at market stalls or online all you ll need to do is make boxes or bags for your bats to be sold in and include photos of the different possible bats your customers may find in their box they would also be perfect for market stall claw machines where customers can try to pick up the bat with the hat they want i have provided images on the last page of this document of the first bat hats pattern pack i will be releasing abbreviations used in this pattern chain - chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet bobble bobble stitch increase increase by crocheting two stitches into the same stitch decrease decrease by crocheting one stitch into the next two stitches number how many stitches are in each row tools needed two different coloured balls of yarn crochet hook scissors belle essie crochet 2 safety eyes x2 tip 1 fill with stuffing as you go as darning needle needed polyester fill - for stuffing tip 2 as the body and head are crocheted in the round place a stitch one stitch marker marker at the beginning of each row to remember where each row begins body and head row 1 8 single_crochet into magic_ring pull yarn end to close the ring 8 row 2 8x increase 16 row 3 1 single_crochet 1x increase x8 24 row 4 8 single_crochet 1 bobble 6 single_crochet 1 bobble 8 single_crochet 24 row 5-11 single_crochet around for seven row 24 row 12 2 single_crochet 1x decrease x6 18 row 13 1 single_crochet 1x decrease x6 12 fill the body with stuffing row 14 2x increase 1 single_crochet x4 20 row 15 1 single_crochet 1x increase 2 single_crochet 1x increase x4 28 row 16-22 single_crochet around for seven row 28 row 23 2 single_crochet 1x decrease x7 21 add eyes between row 18 and 19 6 stitches apart use white yarn to embroider the whites of the eyes row 24 1 single_crochet 1x decrease x7 14 fill the head with stuffing row 25 7x decrease 7 slip_stitch into the next stitch then cut the yarn leaving a long tail and sew the hole closed using the tail of yarn by threading the yarn through one loop from each of the 7 single_crochet stitches and then pull
